ygData.subject: Re: EQ Viewer
ygData.msgSnippet: If this is the program that lets you load any zone into the tutorial, then yes, I ve seen it.  Don t have any links but you can try the files section at eq
ygData.messageBody:
If this is the program that lets you load any zone into the tutorial, then
yes, I've seen it. Don't have any links but you can try the files section
at eq stratics. It's a bit grainy and doesn't let you go into full screen
mode, but it does work. It's always daylight and sunny in whatever zone
you load (try it with a dark zone like kithicor, it's pretty funny!). I
used it a couple months ago to check out the plane of hate.

Word of warning tho. It messed up my install, had to reinstall EQ afterwards.

At 03:12 PM 11/05/1999 , you wrote:
>From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>
>I've only heard rumors of this in-game, anyone have a link or information
>where to find this program?
>
>>Get paid to surf the web! Free!
